```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
commanders <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HunterBruso/Final-Project/master/List%20Of%20Commanders.csv")

```
```{r}
spec(commanders
     )
```

```{r}
view(commanders)
```
```{r}
head(commanders)
```
```{r}

S_Rank <- commanders %>%
  filter(Tier == "S")
S_Rank
```
```{r}
A_Rank <- commanders %>%
  filter(Tier == "A")
A_Rank
```

```{r}
B_Rank <- commanders %>%
  filter(Tier == "B")
B_Rank
```

```{r}
C_Rank <- commanders %>%
  filter(Tier == "C")
C_Rank
```

```{r}
D_Rank <- commanders %>%
  filter(Tier == "D")
D_Rank
```

```{r}
F_Rank <- commanders %>%
  filter(Tier == "F")
F_Rank
```

```{r}
S_Rank_2019 <- S_Rank %>%
  filter(Year == 2019)
S_Rank_2019
```


```{r}

  ggplot(S_Rank, aes(x=Year)) +geom_bar() + xlab("Year Made") + ylab("Rank")

```
```{r}
filter(S_Rank, Year == min(Year, na.rm = TRUE))
```
